meanings.definition: Resembling an oar in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The canoe had an oarlike paddle for rowing.
meanings.sent2: The boat had a long, oarlike shape that helped it glide through the water smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The oarlike design of the paddle made it look like a giant spoon!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved in an oarlike motion as she stirred the soup.
meanings.sent5: The oarlike fins of the fish helped it navigate the strong currents.
